bibl.title: Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE.
bibl.note: Many of the papers in this volume had their origin in a conference at the University of Reading, "Graeco-Aegyptiaca / Aegypto-Graeca: Interactions between Greece and Egypt 700 BCE - 300 CE", 2007. - Pp. 1-39: I.R., Introduction. Interaction and Translation between Greek Literature and Egypt; - 383-393: Index. - 13 contributions.
bibl.seg: Ian Rutherford (ed.), Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2016, 8°, xiv-393 pp., figg. ISBN 978-0-19-965612-7. £80.

Many of the papers in this volume had their origin in a conference at the University of Reading, "Graeco-Aegyptiaca / Aegypto-Graeca: Interactions between Greece and Egypt 700 BCE - 300 CE", 2007. - Pp. 1-39: I.R., Introduction. Interaction and Translation between Greek Literature and Egypt; - 383-393: Index. - 13 contributions.
